title: The Dragon in the Closet
description: Have you ever been afraid of something at night? The Dragon in the Closet is a fictional story about a boy named Simon who does not like bedtime. That's when a dragon living in his closet comes out. Simon's dad helps him overcome his fear by sharing what he learned as a boy about the lion that lived under his bed. Students will have the opportunity to identify the problem and its solution as well as the proper use of quotation marks.
highFrequencyWords: adventures, beasts, creaked, excitement, lonely, spikes
